Text:
Sorry for the late release of this one. I will continue my uploads from here on. Though please be careful that the on going series are not weekly releases so it could be delayed. Once Bleach starts we might see weekly releases though that depends on the schedule of DVD releases.

Hope you enjoy this one!!
